txt.en: You have discovered foul idol in the south-west of Urugarth
You have discovered the foul idol in the south of Urugarth
You have discovered the foul idol in the centre of Urugarth
Found along the streets and alleys of Urugarth, these foul idols can act as beacons to alert Lagmâs's soldiers to the presence of intruders. Destroying them may raise the ire of the Orcs in Urugarth.
